FilipinoMartialArts—ALegacyForABayAreaFa.name: Filipino martial arts — a legacy for a Bay Area family
FilipinoMartialArts—ALegacyForABayAreaFa.summary: NBC Bay Area is celebrating Asian American, Native Hawaiian and Pacific Islander Heritage, shining a light on some of the people who make our area so unique. For many in these communities, martial arts is much more than a hobby, but for a local Filipino family — it’s tradition.

FilipinoMartialArtsHelpingPeopleConnectT.name: Filipino martial arts helping people connect to their culture
FilipinoMartialArtsHelpingPeopleConnectT.summary: Shawn Chitnis reports on how some Bay Area residents are getting in touch with their Filipino heritage.

WhyITrainFilipinoMartialArtsForSelfDefen.name: Why I Train Filipino Martial Arts For Self Defense | Pekiti Tirsia Kali
WhyITrainFilipinoMartialArtsForSelfDefen.summary: Sheila, a student of the PEKITI TIRSIA KALI system gives us an in depth look at how and why Kali is apart of her lifestyle. The martial arts system has established a deeper root for her as a person and as a fighter.
